channel.title: CVE Feed for LINE Corporation -- LINE for Windows
channel.description: The latest CVEs for LINE Corporation -- LINE for Windows

item.title: CVE-2022-22820|2024-08-03T03:21:49.159Z -- line%20corporation -- line%20for%20windows
item.description: Due to the lack of media file checks before rendering, it was possible for an attacker to cause abnormal CPU consumption for message recipient by sending specially crafted gif image in LINE for Windows before 7.4.

item.title: CVE-2022-29505|2024-08-03T06:26:05.981Z -- line%20corporation -- line%20for%20windows
item.description: Due to build misconfiguration in openssl dependency, LINE for Windows before 7.8 is vulnerable to DLL injection that could lead to privilege escalation.
